title: [Nishaye Accoutrements]
description: Dapples of sunlight filter through the panes of three floor-length windows to spill over a glistening lacquered floor of kakore.  Patterned with copper-painted fireleaf leaves, the textured cream walls are studded with brass candle sconces, contributing to the warm natural light.  Several fan-carved lacewood racks and an enameled azurite table act as homes for a variety of lush trappings.

Dapples of moonbeams filter through the panes of three floor-length windows to spill over a glistening lacquered floor of kakore.  Patterned with copper-painted fireleaf leaves, the textured cream walls are studded with brass candle sconces, contributing to the warm natural light.  Several fan-carved lacewood racks and an enameled azurite table act as homes for a variety of lush trappings.
